Job Description: Job Description       Senior Software Developer       Mysore Office      Experienced Web Developers    ASP .Net / C# / SQL Server Developer   We are recruiting for senior web developers who might have a range of experience. You will be working on the latest Microsoft web technologies such as ASP .NET 4.5.2, MVC, C#, LINQ, Entity Framework, JQuery, AJAX and SQL Server.
